name: Quick Algebras: A Personal Project
description:
Hi! My name is Rafi, and I am making a game for my personal project. This game was made from scratch in Unity by myself with no prior knowledge whatsoever on how you actually make one, so I apologize for the rookie-level content. The message that I am trying to convey through this game is that games aren't just for fun and entertainment, but can be used as a form of education as well!

In this game, you must try to please Big Shaq on how quick your maths is by answering the true or false questions regarding algebra in this game as quick as you can! if you get one mistake, your streak will end and thus your try! Score as high as you can and brag about it to your friends!
